line.text: In loving thee thou know I am forsworn
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But thou art twice forsworn to me love swearing
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: In act thy bed-vow broke and new faith torn
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: In vowing new hate after new love bearing
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But why of two oaths breach do I accuse thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When I break twenty I am perjured most
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For all my vows are oaths but to misuse thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And all my honest faith in thee is lost
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For I have sworn deep oaths of thy deep kindness
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Oaths of thy love thy truth thy constancy
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And to enlighten thee gave eyes to blindness
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Or made them swear against the thing they see
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For I have sworn thee fair more perjured I
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To swear against the truth so foul a be
